basics.name: Lautaro Colazo
basics.label: Full-Stack developer
basics.summary: Experienced full-stack Software Developer driven by a passion for technology, continuous learning, and creative problem-solving. Dedicated to developing software solutions that make a positive impact and help others. Proficient in a wide range of languages and technologies including Python, Django Framework, Celery, PostgreSQL, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Git (Bitbucket, GitHub, GitLab), and Postman. With a sharp eye for detail, I specialize in crafting software that not just meets, but goes beyond expectations. My dedication to excellence extends to working closely with diverse teams, ensuring everything fits seamlessly, and delivering solutions fast.

work.name: BYU-Idaho Support Center
work.summary: As a member of the Business Solutions team at the BYU-Idaho Support Center, I actively contribute to the development of digital solutions, system automation, and business intelligence. Our goal is to support the call center in efficiently assisting students to find the necessary help and resources.

work.name: BYU-Idaho Support Center

work.name: Magnify
work.summary: I gained extensive experience with the Django framework, primarily focused on maintaining and improving existing APIs. This involved designing and implementing new endpoints and services using Django REST framework and conducting thorough testing of API functionality using tools like Postman. Additionally, I utilized SQL queries to analyze data stored in a PostgreSQL database. A significant aspect of my work involved optimizing code and Django ORM queries to enhance performance, resulting in notable improvements in loading times, with enhancements of up to 64%.
